New Records: Josh Naylor reached 30th and 31st home runs of the season with two game-tying homers in the second and seventh innings
Naylor joins José Ramírez as the only two players on Cleveland’s roster with at least 30 homers
Key Match Events: Brayan Rocchio hit a walk-off single in the 10th inning to win the game for the Guardians
Josh Naylor had a two-homer night, including a Statcast-projected, 445-foot bomb into the right field seats
Pre-Game Insights: The Guardians are closing in on a playoff berth and a win on Thursday would clinch a postseason spot
Post-Match Reflections: Guardians manager Stephen Vogt said the win was a complete team effort and that the team never gave up
Guardians outfielder Will Brennan said there's a hunger in the clubhouse to prove people wrong and that something special is brewing
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians have seen plenty of success and enjoyed high moments, but the second half of the season has felt different from the first
The team has rediscovered its magic and vibe as they close in on a playoff berth
